result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ronald Collins

defendant.name: Collins, Ronald
defendant.address: 7222 West Burleigh Street Apt 8, Milwaukee, WI 53210

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: filed by ADA Catelin Ringersma on behalf of the State.
For purposes of a global resolution only.

Defendant Ronald Collins in court with attorney Darryl Smith.  Catelin Ringersma appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

AS TO COUNT 1:  Upon State's motion and pursuant to negotiations, Court ordered Count #1 dismissed and read-in for sentencing purposes.

Defendant Ronald Collins in court with attorney Darryl E. Smith.  Catelin Ringersma appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Statements made.
State requests an adjournment for time to notice the victim.
Court GRANTS request.
Case adjourned to 07-15-2015 at 8:30 AM - Br. 2, Judge Donald's Court for Adjourned Plea and Sentencing Hearing.

Defendant Ronald Collins in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case heard off the record.   Statements by defense counsel that defendant has a pending case set for plea and sentencing in Branch 02. Neither party requests to address the court on the record. Signed, Filed & Distributed, Agreed Upon Request for A New Court Date form.  Parties are notified that effective June 8, 2015 this case will be reassigned per rotation to Reserve Judge, Branch 45 in Courthouse room 515.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Colin P. McGinn in court, defendant Ronald Collins not in court, in custody.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
FILE NOT IN COURT
Defendant not produced.  Statements by defense counsel that defendant has a pending felony case.  Defense requests a status conference date.  Court orders case adjourned to Branch 46.  Status conference scheduled for June 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Colin P. McGinn in court, defendant Ronald Collins not in court, in custody.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case heard off the record.  Case scheduled for plea/sentencing.  Defendant has a pending felony before Judge Donald, Branch 02.  Defense requests a status date. Case adjourned to Branch 46.  Status conference scheduled for May 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Ronald Collins in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense requests at least 60 days for a plea/sentencing date.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 46. jks
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 04-28-2015 at 01:30 pm.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Patricia B.
Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings. Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Ronald Collins in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.  Defendant Ronald Collins in custody.  Jay Randal Pucek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  HMP
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Branch 46.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 25, 2015 at 01:30pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Ronald Collins

Prior: 7222 West Burleigh Street, Milwaukee, WI 53210
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
